Spell.Name: Absorb Beholder and Doomsphere Spells
Spell.Description: This effect absorbs the standard spells, spells from beholder and doomsphere eye beams. A charge is expended for each eye beam absorbed.

Spell.Name: Absorb Beholder Spells
Spell.Description: This effect absorbs most spells cast by beholder eye stalks. Only a few such spells can be absorbed before the item ceases to function and must have time to dissipate the absorbed energy.

Spell.Name: Absorb Doomsphere Spells
Spell.Description: This effect absorbs most spells cast by doomsphere eye stalks. Only a few such spells can be absorbed before the item ceases to function and must have time to dissipate the absorbed energy.

Spell.Name: Absorb Enchantment Spells
Spell.Description: This effect absorbs most enchantment-based spells. Only a few such spells can be absorbed before the item ceases to function and must have time to dissipate the absorbed energy.

Spell.Name: Absorb Petrification
Spell.Description: This effect absorbs most petrification spells. Only a few such spells can be absorbed before the item ceases to function and must have time to dissipate the absorbed energy.

Spell.Name: Absorbs Magic Missiles
Spell.Description: This effect absorbs magic missile spells targeted at the wearer.

Spell.Name: Acid Breath
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Duration: 30 seconds School: Breath Weapon Spell Resistance: No You breath a cone of potent acidic energy. Enemies hit by the cone take acid damage and suffer additional acid damage over time.

Spell.Name: Acid Shot
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Fires a missile of acid that corrodes your enemies. At higher charge levels multiple projectiles are fired in a spray. Opponents struck by a projectile receive a Fortitude save for half damage.
Charge Tier 1: 4 to 10 + 1 to 2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 5 to 15 + 1 to 4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 6 to 20 + 1 to 6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 7 to 25 + 1 to 8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 8 to 30 + 1 to 10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Aid
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self Duration: 3 minutes School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: No Adds 8 + 1 per caster level (max level 10) temporary hit points, and grants a +1 morale bonuses on attack rolls and saves against fear.

Spell.Name: Alaphon's Staff: Spell Selection
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 2 minutes School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: Yes This staff may cast powerful versions of Lightning Bolt, Fireball, Cone of Cold, or Hold monster. Although it does not regain charges when you rest, it automatically regains charges over time.

Spell.Name: Bane of the Undead Flame
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional Duration: 8 seconds School: Necromancy Spell Resistance: No Dispels Fire Shield (cold) and severely weakens Cinderspawns.

Spell.Name: Bee Shot
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Duration: 6 seconds School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Fires bees at enemies. At higher levels more bees are fired. Opponents struck by the bees receive a Fortitude save for half damage.
Charge Tier 1: 4 to 14 + 1d2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 5 to 19 + 1d4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 6 to 24 + 1d6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 7 to 29 + 1d8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 8 to 34 + 1d10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Bestow Curse
Spell.Description: Target: Foe Duration: 2 minutes 40 seconds School: Necromancy Spell Resistance: Yes The target is cursed, giving a -4 penalty to attack rolls, skill rolls and saves. A successful Will save negates this effect.

Spell.Name: Black Dragon Bolt
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Duration: 6 seconds School: Conjuration Deals 3 to 18 Acid damage to a target with a magical bolt of Acid. The bolt does an additional 2 to 12 damage every 2 seconds for 6 seconds.

Spell.Name: Bless
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 5 minutes School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: No You and any allies near you are filled with courage and gain +1 morale bonuses to attack rolls and saving throws against fear, with an additional +1 per 5 caster levels, max 5 at caster level 20. Bless counters and dispels Bane.

Spell.Name: Blinding Flash
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Direction, Breakable Duration: 6 seconds School: Evocation Blinds the target with a globe of searing radiance.

Spell.Name: Blood Sacrifice
Spell.Description: Target: Self School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No Exchange 25 hit points for 50 spell points

Spell.Name: Boneshatter
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Duration: 12 seconds School: Transmutation Spell Resistance: Yes Deals 3 to 18 damage plus 1 to 8 damage every 2 seconds and cripples the target on a failed Fortitude save. Deals 2 to 12 damage on a successful Fortitude save.

Spell.Name: Book Shot
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Hurls book at enemies. At higher charge levels multiple books are rapidly fired. Opponents struck by the books receive a Reflex save for half damage.
Charge Tier 1: 4 to 14 + 1 to 2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 5 to 19 + 1 to 4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 6 to 24 + 1 to 6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 7 to 29 + 1 to 8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 8 to 34 + 1 to 10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Break Enchantment
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self, Positional School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: Yes Affected allies in an area are freed from harmful enchantments, transmutations, and curses. You must make a caster level check of 1 to 20 + your caster level (maximum +15) versus 11 + the spell's caster level to remove the effect.

Spell.Name: Burning Hands
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No A cone of searing flame shoots forth, damaging targets in the area of the flames for 2 to 7 Fire damage per caster level (up to a max of 10 to 35 at caster level 5). A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half.

Spell.Name: Call Lightning Storm
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 3 seconds per caster level School: Evocation Spell resistance: No Creates a storm cloud that persists for some time and randomly strikes nearby enemies with bolts of lightning for 7 to 12 electrical damage for every caster level. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half.

Spell.Name: Camouflage
Spell.Description: An ally becomes more able to blend in with its surroundings giving them a +10 Determination bonus to Hide.

Spell.Name: Cause Fear
Spell.Description: Target: Foe Duration: 6 to 24 seconds School: Necromancy Spell Resistance: Yes An enemy becomes frightened. A successful Will save cause the target to become shaken instead. Necrotic energy slows the target slightly.

Spell.Name: Chain Lightning
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No A powerful electrical discharge strikes a primary target for 7 to 12 electrical damage per caster level and then arcs to other nearby targets hitting each of them with a similar lightning bolt. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half.

Spell.Name: Charm Canine
Spell.Description: Target: Foe Duration: 10 minutes School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: No An enemy non-magical canine is charmed and will fight as a trusted friend and ally. Charmed monsters get additional saves every 15 to 20 seconds. A successful DC 22 Will save negates this effect.

Spell.Name: Charm Person
Spell.Description: Target: Foe Duration: 1 minute 6 seconds School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: Yes Charms an enemy humanoid, which will fight as a trusted friend and ally. Charmed humanoids get an additional saving throw every 3d6+12 seconds. A successful Will save negates this effect. Humanoids include kobolds, goblinoids, player races except for warforged, and more creatures.

Spell.Name: Cloudkill
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Positional, Breakable Duration: 1 minute 20 seconds School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No A bank of heavy yellowish green, poisonous fog rises up, slaying weak targets within the cloud while inflicting stronger targets 1 to 4 Constitution damage and 2 to 12 acid damage plus an additional 1 acid damage for every caster level up to 20. Successful Fortitude saves reduces the Constitution and Acid damage by half. This fog obscures sight, giving all creatures in the fog concealment (attackers have 20% miss chance). Creatures immune to poison are undamaged by the spell.

Spell.Name: Cold Bolts
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Fires ice crystals that damage your enemies. At higher charge levels multiple bolts are rapidly fired. Opponents struck by the crystals receive a Fortitude save for half damage.
Charge Tier 1: 4 to 10 + 1 to 2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 5 to 15 + 1 to 4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 6 to 20 + 1 to 6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 7 to 25 + 1 to 8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 8 to 30 + 1 to 10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Cold Fire
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional Duration: 8 seconds School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No This spell dispells Fire Shield (hot), Wall of Fire, Flaming Sphere and other magical flames.

Spell.Name: Concentrate Harder!
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: Permanent School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Activating the power of this item will calm your mind, granting a +5 Competence bonus to the Concentration skill. This lasts until you activate the special power of another cosmetic item, or log out.

Spell.Name: Cone of Cold
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Creates an area of extreme cold, originating at your hand and spreading outward in a cone. It drains heat, dealing 4 to 6 points of Cold damage per caster level (up to a maximum of 60 to 90 damage at caster level 15). A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half.

Spell.Name: Conjure Ice Arrow
Spell.Description: Target: Self School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Summons the bow's Icy Arrow, the Frozen Terror, which has a chance to conjure a frozen gale on a natural 20.

Spell.Name: Control Undead
Spell.Description: Target: Foe Duration: 2 minutes 24 seconds School: Necromancy Spell Resistance: Yes Control is granted over the enemy undead, forcing it to fight for you. Controlled undead get an additional save every 2 minutes. A successful Will save negates this effect.

Spell.Name: Corrupted Exploding Fire Shot
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Fires an explosive ball of flame that damage your enemies. Opponents struck by the fireball receive a Will save for half damage. At charge Tier 3 and higher, opponents within the blast have a 25% chance to have a Curse spell cast on them.
Charge Tier 1: 4 to 10 + 1 to 2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 5 to 15 + 1 to 4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 6 to 20 + 1 to 6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 7 to 25 + 1 to 8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 8 to 30 + 1 to 10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Corrupted Fire Blast
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Deals fire damage to a target with a cone shaped blast of fire. At higher charge tiers the blast is larger. Opponents within the blast receive a Will save for half damage. At charge Tier 3 and higher, opponents within the blast have a 25% chance to have a Curse spell cast on them.
Charge Tier 1: 4 to 10 + 1 to 2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 5 to 15 + 1 to 4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 6 to 20 + 1 to 6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 7 to 25 + 1 to 8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 8 to 30 + 1 to 10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Crushing Despair
Spell.Description: Target: Poe, Positional Duration: 2 minutes 24 seconds School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: No Causes great sadness in enemies, giving -2 penalties to attack, saves, skill checks, and weapon damage. A successful Will save negates this effect but regardless of the saves result the targets are left in vulnerable state to future mental attack. Applies weaken will effect.

Spell.Name: Cure Critical Wounds, Mass
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self, Undead Friend, Undead Foe School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Casts Cure Critical Wounds on multiple targets. Positive energy is channeled to heal critical wounds of allies for 4d6+8 plus 1 per caster level (Maximum caster level 40.) hit points, or deals the same amount of damage to an undead creature. (A Will save reduces this damage by half).

Spell.Name: Cure Light Wounds
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self, Undead Friend, Undead Foe School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Positive energy is channeled to heal light wounds of your target or damage undead for 3 to 8 hit points plus an additional 1 for every caster level up to caster level 5. Undead who make a successful Will save reduce the damage by half.

Spell.Name: Cure Serious Wounds
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self, Undead Foe School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Positive energy is channeled to heal serious wounds of your target or damage undead for 9 to 24 hit points plus an additional 1 for every caster level up to caster level 15. Undead who make a successful Will save reduce the damage by half.

Spell.Name: Cure Serious Wounds, Mass
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self, Undead Friend, Undead Foe School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Casts Cure Serious Wounds on multiple targets. Positive energy is channeled to heal serious wounds of allies for 3d6+6 plus 1 per caster level (Maximum caster level 35.) hit points, or deals the same amount of damage to an undead creature. (A Will save reduces this damage by half).

Spell.Name: Cyclonic Blast
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Duration: 6 seconds School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No You send a twisting torrent of wind toward your enemies that deals 4 to 6 damage per caster level (up to a max of 80 to 120 damage at caster level 20) to targets in its path. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half. If the target fails its Reflex save, it must make a Strength check or be knocked down. As a bolt this spell has double range. The spell also clears away all lingering effects in its path, such as clouds and walls of fire.

Spell.Name: Dark Discorporation
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 20 seconds School: Transmutation Spell Resistance: No You turn yourself into a swarm of batlike shadows. In this form, you gain Invisibility, 25% Incorporeality, and damage from all sources (except for untyped/Bane) damage is reduced by 50%. Attacking enemies or interacting with objects will revert you to normal form.

Spell.Name: Death Ward
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self Duration: 7 minutes School: Transmutation Spell Resistance: No Grants an ally immunity to death spells and effects, Energy Drained, and negative energy effects.

Spell.Name: Deep Slumber
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Positional Duration: 30 seconds School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: Yes Induces a magical slumber to a group of enemies, rendering them helpless until attacked or for a duration of 20 seconds plus 2 per caster level. Ineffective on undead or constructs. A successful Will save negates this effect.

Spell.Name: Detect Secret Doors
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 10 minutes School: Divination Spell Resistance: No Allows you to find secret doors with a DC of 5 or less. This increases by 3 for every two caster levels.

Spell.Name: Dimension Door
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self, Positional Duration: 30 seconds School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Creates a magical doorway that will return you to the entrance of the current zone.

Spell.Name: Disintegrate
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Transmutation Spell Resistance: No A sickly green ray emanates forth, doing 2d3+6 damage per caster level to the target. (Maximum damage 40d3+120.) Anything reduced to 0 hit points is disintegrated. A successful Fortitude save reduces this damage to 6d3+12.

Spell.Name: Dismissal
Spell.Description: Target: Foe School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: Yes Instantly forces an extraplanar enemy back to its proper plane. A successful Will save negates this effect. (DC = spells's save DC - creature's Hit Dice of Level + your caster level). Even on a successful save the target still suffers 4 to 6 damage per caster level in damage.

Spell.Name: Dispel Madstone Effects
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self Spell Resistance: No Removes the deleterious effects of Madstone.

Spell.Name: Displacement
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 6 seconds per caster level School: Illusion Spell Resistance: No Your appearance becomes extremely blurred, giving enemies a 50% miss chance when attacking.

Spell.Name: Dispel the Grip of Strahd
Spell.Description: Casting this on an ally afflicted by the Grip of Strahd will remove that condition before their untimely death.

Spell.Name: Dressed for the Occasion
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: Permanent School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Activating the power of tis item will fill you with unholy power, granting a +5 Competence bonus to Perform and Diplomacy skills. This lasts until you activate the special power of another cosmetic item, or log out.

Spell.Name: Doom
Spell.Description: Target: Foe Duration: 30 seconds School: Necromancy Spell Resistance: Yes A single enemy is filled with a feeling of horrible dread that causes it to become shaken, penalizing all saves, attack rolls, and skill rolls by -2. A successful Will save negates this effect. This is a fear effect.

Spell.Name: Efficacy VI
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 1 minute Spell Resistance: No Increases the damage of your 6th level and lower spells by 20% for 1 minute. This effect does not stack with other item effects or potions and does not affect spells you cast with wands and scrolls.

Spell.Name: Electrical Blast
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Deals electrical damage to a target with a cone shaped blast of lightning. At higher charge tiers the blast is larger. Opponents within the blast receive a Reflex save for half damage.
Charge Tier 1: 4 to 10 + 1 to 2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 5 to 15 + 1 to 4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 6 to 20 + 1 to 6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 7 to 25 + 1 to 8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 8 to 30 + 1 to 10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Electrical Lash
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Fires a slow moving ball of electricity that lashes nearby opponents. At higher charge tiers additional enemies are lashed, Opponents struck by this receive a Reflex save for half damage.
Charge Tier 1: 4 to 10 + 1 to 2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 5 to 15 + 1 to 4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 6 to 20 + 1 to 6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 7 to 25 + 1 to 8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 8 to 30 + 1 to 10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Electrical Storm
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Fires electrical bolts at enemies. At higher charge levels multiple bolts are rapidly fired. Opponents struck by the crystals receive a Reflex save for half damage.
Charge Tier 1: 4 to 10 + 1 to 2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 5 to 15 + 1 to 4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 6 to 20 + 1 to 6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 7 to 25 + 1 to 8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 8 to 30 + 1 to 10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Elite Spider Cult Mask
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: Permanent School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Activating the power of tis item will fill you with unholy power, granting a +1 Profane bonus to all skills and a +4 Profane bonus to saves against poisons. This lasts until you activate the special power of another cosmetic item, or log out.

Spell.Name: Expeditious Retreat
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 5 minutes School: Transmutation Spell Resistance: No Increases base run speed by 25%.

Spell.Name: Enhanced Jet Propulsion
Spell.Description: Use this item to activate the air elemental bound within, thus propelling you forward at great speeds. It takes five minutes to recharge between uses.

Spell.Name: Exploding Cannon Shot
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Fires a conjured stone projectile that explodes when it strikes an enemy or object. Opponents in the blast radius take both bludgeoning and fire damage.
Charge Tier 1: 4 to 10 + 1 to 2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 5 to 15 + 1 to 4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 6 to 20 + 1 to 6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 7 to 25 + 1 to 8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 8 to 30 + 1 to 10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Exploding Fire Shot
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Fires and explosive ball of flame that damage your enemies. Opponents struck by the fireball receive a Reflex save for half damage.
Charge Tier 1: 4 to 10 + 1 to 2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 5 to 15 + 1 to 4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 6 to 20 + 1 to 6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 7 to 25 + 1 to 8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 8 to 30 + 1 to 10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Fear
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional Duration: 42 seconds School: Necromancy Spell Resistance: Yes A cone of terror causes each living enemy in an area to become panicked. A successful Will save causes enemies to become shaken. Creatures that fail their save are also slowed by necrotic energy.

Spell.Name: Feather Fall
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 30 seconds School: Transmutation Spell Resistance: No Causes an ally to fall slowly, although faster than feathers typically do.

Spell.Name: Fire Blast
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Deals fire damage to a target with a cone shaped blast of fire. At higher charge tiers the blast is larger. Opponents within the blast receive a Will save for half damage. At charge Tier 3 and higher, opponents within the blast have a 25% chance to have a Curse spell cast on them.
Charge Tier 1: 4 to 10 + 1 to 2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 5 to 15 + 1 to 4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 6 to 20 + 1 to 6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 7 to 25 + 1 to 8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 8 to 30 + 1 to 10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Fire Shield (Hot)
Spell.Description: When you are successfully attacked, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield (Hot) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield (Cold) from another item source, they will nullify each-other.

Spell.Name: Fire Shield (Fire)
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 1 minute 21 seconds School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Wreaths the caster in hot flames. Any creature striking you in melee takes 1d3+3 plus 1 per caster level (Maximum caster level 15.) Fire damage, and reduces damage the caster takes from cold by half. The flames from this spell will burn away any webs that attempt to entangle you.

Spell.Name: Fire Storm
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Positional, Breakable Duration: 8 seconds School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No An enormous column of fire roars downward, blasting an area with searing flame, causing 1d6+8 fire damage per caster level to targets in its area.

Spell.Name: Flaming Sphere
Spell.Description: Target: Self, Positional Duration: 1 minute School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Creates a ball of flame that rolls around slowly, burning enemies it encounters and doing 2 to 12 points of fire damage. A successful Reflex save negates this effect.

Spell.Name: Flame Strike
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Positional, Breakable Duration: 8 seconds School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Produces a vertical column of divine fire roaring downward, dealing 6 to 11 damage per caster level (up to a max of 90 to 165 damage at caster level 15) to the target area. Half the damage is fire. Half s from pure divine power. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half.

Spell.Name: Force Shot
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Fires a missile of force that damages your enemies. At higher charge levels multiple projectiles are fired in a spray. Opponents struck by these bolts receive a Will save for half damage.
Charge Tier 1: 3 to 6 + 1 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 5 to 11 + 1 to 2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 6 to 16 + 1 to 4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 7 to 21 + 1 to 6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 8 to 26 + 1 to 8 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Fog Cloud
Spell.Description: A glass vial filled with water and a thick mist. When it breaks on impact, a bank of Fog Cloud is created on the enemy it struck.

Spell.Name: Frost Lance
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Shoots a target with a freezing energy spear, dealing 4d5+20 Cold damage on impact. The number of lances increases by 1 for every four levels beyond 3rd, to a maximum of three at 11th level. Ray spells have double range.

Spell.Name: Ghost Shot
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Fires a glob of molten gold at your enemies that sticks to your foes or the ground. At higher charge tiers additional enemies can be stuck. Opponents struck by this receive a Reflex save for half damage.
Charge Tier 1: 4 to 10 + 1 to 2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 5 to 15 + 1 to 4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 6 to 20 + 1 to 6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 7 to 25 + 1 to 8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 8 to 30 + 1 to 10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Gold Shot
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Fires a missile of acid that corrodes your enemies. At higher charge levels multiple projectiles are fired in a spray. Opponents struck by a projectile receive a Fortitude save for half damage.
Charge Tier 1: 4 to 10 + 1 to 2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 5 to 15 + 1 to 4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 6 to 20 + 1 to 6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 7 to 25 + 1 to 8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 8 to 30 + 1 to 10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Greater Restoration
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Cures all ability damage, restores all negative levels suffered from energy drain, and eliminates fatigue or exhaustion suffered by the ally.

Spell.Name: Greater Teleport
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 1 minute School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Teleports you and all nearby allies to one of a variety of locations.

Spell.Name: Gorgon Breath
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Duration: 1 minute + 10 seconds per caster level School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Releases a cone of petrifying dust and rock that is similar to the breath of a Gorgon. Enemies made of flesh in the area of the cone are turned to stone if they fail a DC 17 Fortitude save. This effect lasts 60 seconds + 10 seconds per caster level, but the target has a chance to remake its Fortitude save every 24 seconds.

Spell.Name: Golem Figurine
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self, Positional School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No this spell teleports Mentau's final Flesh Golem guardian to your location. The Golem may or may not do your bidding.

Spell.Name: Good Hope
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self Duration: 1 minute per caster level School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: No This area of effect spell instills powerful hope to the recipients, granting a +2 morale bonus to attack rolls, saving throws, skill checks, and weapon damage rolls. Good hope counters and dispels Crushing Despair.

Spell.Name: Greater Ardor
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 3 minutes School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No When activated, this effect provides a +20 Alchemical bonus to your Positive Spell Power for three minutes.

Spell.Name: Greater Command
Spell.Description: Target: Foe Duration: 54 seconds School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: Yes Enemies are commanded to fall to the ground and lie prone. A successful Will save negates this effect.

Spell.Name: Greater Efficacy
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 3 minutes School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No When activated, this effect provides a +12 Alchemical bonus to your Universal Spell Power for three minutes.

Spell.Name: Greater Erosion
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 3 minutes School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No When Activated, this effect provides a +20 Alchemical bonus to your Acid Spell Power for three minutes.

Spell.Name: Greater Freeze
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 3 minutes School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No When Activated, this effect provides a +20 Alchemical bonus to your Cold Spell Power for three minutes.

Spell.Name: Greater Heroism
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self Duration: 11 minutes School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: No Imbues a single ally creature with great bravery and morale in battle. The target gains a +4 morale bonus on attack rolls, saves, and skill checks. The target also receives temporary hit points equal to the caster level and immunity to fear.

Spell.Name: Greater Inferno
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 3 minutes School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No When activated, this effect provides a +20 Alchemical bonus to your Fire Spell Power for three minutes.

Spell.Name: Greater Spark
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 3 minutes School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No When Activated, this effect provides a +20 Alchemical bonus to your Electric Spell Power for three minutes.

Spell.Name: Gust of Wind
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Duration: 10 seconds School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No This spell creates a severe blast of air that originates from you and passes through all creatures in its path. Small or smaller enemies are knocked prone, while Medium or smaller enemies are slowed by the winds. A Reflex save equal to 12 + your casting stat's modifier negates these effects. Large or larger enemies are unaffected. The spell also clears away all lingering effects in its path, such as clouds and walls of fire.

Spell.Name: Harm
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Undead Friend School: Necromancy Spell Resistance: No Charges the target with a massive amount of negative energy, dealing 10 points of damage per caster level. (Maximum damage 150.) Harm cannot reduce the target's hit points to less than 1. A successful Will save reduces the damage by half. Against Undead targets this spell heals like Heal.

Spell.Name: Haste
Spell.Description: Target: Foe Duration: 6 seconds per caster level School: Transmutation Spell Resistance: No Creatures in the area are quickened and gain a 32% enhancement bonus to run speed, and a 15% enhancement bonus to attack speed. In addition the recipient gains a +1 untyped bonus to attack rolls, plus a +1% dodge bonus and Reflex saves. Dispels and counters Slow.

Spell.Name: Heal
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self, Undead Friend, Undead Foe School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Casts Heal on multiple targets. Channels powerful positive energy into allies to wipe away injury and afflictions, restore 10 Hit Points per caster level (Maximum caster level 25.), removes the conditions or effects: Ability Damaged, Blinded, Confused, Dazed, Dazzled, Deafened, Diseased, Exhausted, Fatigued, Feebleminded, Insanity, Nauseated and Poisoned. Against Undead this spell acts as Harm. Undead who make a successful Will save reduce the damage by half.

Spell.Name: Heal Light Wounds
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Heals 6 to 11 hit points for all characters including Warforged, who are resistant to other forms of healing.

Spell.Name: Heal, Mass
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self, Undead Friend, Undead Foe School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Channels powerful positive energy into allies to wipe away injury and afflictions, restore 10 Hit Points per caster level (Maximum caster level 15.), removes the conditions or effects: Ability Damaged, Blinded, Confused, Dazed, Dazzled, Deafened, Diseased, Exhausted, Fatigued, Feebleminded, Insanity, Nauseated and Poisoned. Against Undead this spell acts as Harm. Undead who make a successful Will save reduce the damage by half.

Spell.Name: Heal Moderate Wounds
Spell.Description:
Target: Friend, Self School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Heals 11 to 21 hit points for all characters including Warforged, who are resistant to other forms of healing.
D&D Dice: Heals 2d6+4 plus 1 per caster level hp.

Spell.Name: Heroism
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self Duration: 5 minutes School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: No Imbues a single ally creature with great bravery and morale in battle. The target gains a +2 morale bonus on attack rolls, saves, and skill checks. The target also receives temporary hit points equal to the caster level and immunity to fear.

Spell.Name: Hippity-Hoppity
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: Permanent School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Activate this hat's power to enable you to leap through the air like a bunny, gaining a +5 Competence bonus to the Jump skill. This lasts until you activate the special power of another cosmetic item, or log out.

Spell.Name: Hold Person
Spell.Description: Target: Foe Duration: 24 seconds School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: Yes The target enemy humanoid becomes paralyzed and freezes in place. It is aware, but can take no actions for a maximum of 6 seconds per caster level. The enemy may attempt to make a new Will save every 3 seconds. Humanoids include Kobolds, Goblinoids, player races except for Warforged, Troglodytes, and more, but do not include Monstrous Humanoids.

Spell.Name: Hold Person, Mass
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Positional Duration: 1 minute 36 seconds School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: Yes Casts Hold Person on multiple humanoids. Affected enemies become paralyzed and can take no actions for a maximum of 6 seconds per caster level. The enemy may make a new Will save every 3 seconds. Humanoids include Kobolds, Goblinoids, Player races except for Warforged, Troglodytes, and more, but do not include Monstrous Humanoids.

Spell.Name: Horn of Thunder
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Positional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Horn of Thunder blasts your foes with 1d4 + 1 Sonic and 1d4 + 1 Electric damage per caster level (max caster level 25). Sonic damage is doubled vs. Oozes, as the thunderous pressure disrupts their amorphous structure. Creatures making a Reflex save take half damage.

Spell.Name: Howl of Terror
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 8 seconds to 24 seconds School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: Yes You utter a terrifying howl, filling your foes with a paralyzing fear. Foes around you are paralyzed for 6 to 24 seconds. Will save negates.

Spell.Name: Hypnotic Pattern
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Positional Duration: 30 seconds School: Illusion Spell Resistance: Yes A twisting pattern of subtle, shifting colors weaves through the air, fascinating targets within it. A successful Will save negates this effect. Creatures exposed to this effect have their Will save momentarily weakened by three.

Spell.Name: Improved Harm
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Undead Friend School: Necromancy Spell Resistance: No Charges the target with a massive amount of negative energy, dealing 15 points of damage per caster level. (Maximum damage 225.) Harm cannot reduce the target's hit points to less than 1. A successful Will save reduces the damage by half. Against Undead targets this spell heals like Heal.

Spell.Name: Intimidation of the Skull
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: Permanent School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Activate the power of this item will help you menace your enemies, granting a +5 Competence bonus to your Intimidate skill. This lasts until you activate the special power of another cosmetic item, or log out.

Spell.Name: Invisibility
Spell.Description: Target: Fiend, Self Duration: 1 minute per caster level School: Illusion Spell Resistance: No An ally becomes invisible, vanishing from sight, even from darkvision. If he or she attacks a target, the effect is removed.

Spell.Name: Jerky
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 5 minutes School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Eating the jerky from the pouch causes a burning sensation of wellbeing to suffuse your body. Your wounds slowly close and all poisons and diseases are expelled. Additionally, you will be warded against poison for thirty seconds with the spell Neutralize Poison.

Spell.Name: Jet Propulsion
Spell.Description: Use this item to activate the air elemental bound within, thus propelling you forward at great speeds. It takes ten minutes to recharge between uses.

Spell.Name: Keoghtom's Ointment
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self Duration: 30 seconds School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Neutralizes Poison, Cures Disease and Cures Light Wounds.

Spell.Name: Knife Shot
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Fires knives at enemies. At higher charge levels multiple knives are rapidly fired. Opponents struck by the knives receive a Reflex save for half damage.
Charge Tier I: 4 to 14 ​ + 1 to 2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier II: 5 to 19 ​ + 1 to 4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier III: 6 to 24 ​ + 1 to 6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier IV: 7 to 29 ​ + 1 to 8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier V: 8 to 34 ​ + 1 to 10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Lesser Absorption of Beholder and Doomsphere Spells
Spell.Description: This effect absorbs most deadly of the standard spells from beholder and doomsphere eye beams. A charge is expended for each eye beam absorbed.

Spell.Name: Lesser Heighten
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 20 seconds School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No Lesser Heighten allows spell casters to use the Metamagic Heighten feat at no additional Spell Point cost. This effect lasts for 20 seconds.

Spell.Name: Lesser Maximize
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 20 seconds School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No Lesser Maximize allows spell casters to use the Metamagic Maximize feat at no additional Spell Point cost. This effect lasts for 20 seconds.

Spell.Name: Light Spirals
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Fires chaotic bolts of light that damage your enemies. At higher charge levels multiple bolts are rapidly fired. opponents struck by these bolts receive a Will save for half damage.
Charge Tier 1: 3 to 6 + 1 to 2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 5 to 11 + 1 to 4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 6 to 16 + 1 to 6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 7 to 21 + 1 to 8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 8 to 26 + 1 to 10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Lightning Bolt
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No A powerful stroke of electrical energy deals 4 to 6 electricity damage per caster level (up to a max of 40 to 60 damage at caster level 10) to targets in its path. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half. For each enemy this spell strikes it has a 50% chance to fork, replicating the spell's effect on that target. This can only happen once. This spell is a bolt and has double range.

Spell.Name: Longstrider
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 10 minutes School: Transmutation Spell Resistance: No increases your base run speed by 15% and shallow water no longer slows your movement.

Spell.Name: Luck of the Green Hat
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: Permanent School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Activating the power of this item will grant you a +1 Luck bonus to your Will Saving Throws. This lasts until you activate the special power of another cosmetic item, or log out.

Spell.Name: Madstone Rage
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 2 minute2 School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: No The chaotic effects of madstone drive you into a murderous rage. Madstone Rage grants +2 Strength, +4 Constitution, +4 natural Armor bonus and 20% Melee Haste, while prohibiting any spell casting.

Spell.Name: Mage Armor
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 6 minutes School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No An invisible, but tangible field of force surrounds an ally, providing a +4 Armor bonus to AC.

Spell.Name: Magestar Absorption
Spell.Description: This effect absorbs harmful spells targeted at the wearer.

Spell.Name: Major Mnemonic Aid
Spell.Description: Target: Self School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No Restores 105-600 spell points.

Spell.Name: Major Mnemonic Enhancer
Spell.Description: Target: Self School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No Restores 105-600 spell points and dispels feeblemind.

Spell.Name: Melf's Acid Arrow
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Duration: 12 seconds School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Deals 2 to 8 acid damage +1 per 2 caster levels to a target with a magical arrow of acid for a duration of 12 seconds. The arrow has double spell range. Max Caster Level: 10

Spell.Name: Meteor Swarm
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Causes four 2-foot-diameter chunks of rock to spring forth and streak in straight lines toward a target, leaving fiery trails of sparks. The meteors explode on impact, dealing 2 to 4 Fire damage per caster level (a successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half) and 2 to 3 bludgeoning damage per caster level (no save) to targets in the area. Unlike most other projectile spells, the caster can arc these meteors if they have no target selected. This spell has double range.

Spell.Name: Minor Mnemonic Aid
Spell.Description: Target: Self School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No Restores 10-35 spell points.

Spell.Name: Move like the Night
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self Duration: 25 seconds School: Transmutation Gain a 50% Festive bonus to Dodge that ignores your Dodge Cap.

Spell.Name: Murlynd's Spoon
Spell.Description: Target: Self School: Conjuration Creates several servings of a tasteless, sticky mush that is nevertheless quite filling.

Spell.Name: Negative Energy Absorption
Spell.Description: Negative Energy Absorption: This effect absorbs negative energy and energy drain effects.

Spell.Name: Night Horrors
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self Duration: 1 minute 30 seconds School: Transmutation Spell Resistance: No Gain a 25% Festive Bonus to Spell Critical Damage that lasts for 90 seconds.

Spell.Name: Nightshield
Spell.Description: Target: Self School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No Grants a +1 resistance bonus to saves (+2 at 6th level, +3 at 9th) and protection from magic missiles.

Spell.Name: Obscuring Mist
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Positional, Breakable A glass vial filled with water and thick mist. When it breaks on impact, a bank of Obscuring Mist is created on the enemy it struck.

Spell.Name: Order's Wrath
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Positional, Breakable Duration: 8 seconds School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Lawful power smites your targets. Only Chaotic and Neutral creatures are harmed by the spell. The spell deals 1d6+8 points of damage per caster level (Maximum damage 10d6+80) to a Chaotic creatures/Outsiders and causes it to be Dazed for 6 seconds. A successful Will save reduces damage to half and negates the Dazed. The spell deals only half damage to creatures who are neither Lawful nor Chaotic, and they are not Dazed. This spell can only be cast by Lawful or Neutral casters, it has no effect when cast by a Chaotic caster.

Spell.Name: Otto's Irresistible Dance
Spell.Description: Target: Foe Duration: 17 to 27 seconds School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: Yes At your touch, enemies feel an irresistible urge to dance and begin doing so, complete with foot shuffling and tapping. The spell makes it impossible for the enemy to do anything other than caper and prance in place.

Spell.Name: Otto's Rresistible Dance
Spell.Description: Target: Foe Duration: 9 seconds School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: Yes At your touch, enemies feel an undeniable urge to dance and begin doing so, complete with foot shuffling and tapping. The spell makes it impossible for the enemy to do anything other than caper and prance in place. A successful Will save negates this effect.

Spell.Name: Panacea
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self, Undead Foe School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Channels powerful positive energy into a target to wipe away afflictions, restores 1d6+2 Hit Points plus 1 per caster level (Maximum caster level 20.), removes the conditions or effects: Ability Damaged, Blinded, Confused, Dazed, Dazzled, Deafened, Diseased, Exhausted, Fatigued, Feebleminded, Insanity, Nauseated and Poisoned. Against Undead this spell will damage 1d6+2 Hit Points plus 1 per caster level. Undead who make a successful Will save reduce the damage by half.

Spell.Name: Party!
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: Permanent School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Activate the power of this item to be amazing at parties, granting a +7 Competence bonus to the Haggle skill and a +5 Competence bonus to the Perform and Diplomacy skills. This lasts until you activate the special power of another cosmetic item, or log out.

Spell.Name: Phantasmal Killer
Spell.Description: Target: Foe Duration: Instantaneous School: Illusion Spell Resistance: Yes You create a phantasmal image of the most fearsome creature imaginable to the subject simply by forming the fears of the subject's subconscious mind into something that its conscious mind can visualize: this most horrible beast. Only the spell's Foe can see the Phantasmal Killer. You see only a vague shape. The target first gets a Will save to recognize the image as unreal to disbelieve the spell and suffer no ill effects. If that save fails, the phantasm touches the subject, and the subject must succeed on a Fortitude save or die from fear. Even if the Fortitude save is successful, the subject takes 1d3+1 points of bane damage per caster level.

Spell.Name: Polar Ray
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Deals 9 to 14 Cold damage per caster level (up to a max of 225 to 350 at caster level 25) to an enemy with a powerful ray of freezing ice and air. Rays have double range.

Spell.Name: Power Drain
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 1 minutes 6 seconds School: Necromancy Spell Resistance: No Power Drain draws magical power from nearby entities and slowly feeds it to the caster. Caster gains 2 to 12 SP every 6 seconds for 1 minute.

Spell.Name: Prismatic Spray
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Duration: 4 seconds to 16 seconds School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No A brilliant cone of multicolored light projects from your finger, blinding weak targets and producing one or more random effects.

Spell.Name: Protection from Elements, Mass
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self Duration: 15 minutes School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No Grants temporary immunity to multiple targets to all forms of energy for 1 minute per caster level or until 12 points of energy per caster level (max 120) for each energy type has been absorbed.

Spell.Name: Protection from Evil
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self Duration: 5 minutes School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No At your touch, a magical barrier is created that wards a target from attacks by Evil creatures, granting a +2 deflection bonus to Armor Class, and a +2 resistance bonus to saves versus attacks from Evil creatures. The target is also warded from Evil magical controls and compulsions.

Spell.Name: Purple Faerie Fire
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Duration: 10 seconds School: Evocation Spell Resistance: Yes Arcs a flare of faerie fire through the air, bursting outward to affect all enemies near it. Targets are dazzled and take a -1 penalty to attack, spot, and search. Targets are also illuminated by faerie fire, dispelling stealth, invisibility, blur, and displacement, for 30 seconds, and giving a -40 penalty to hide. Sightless enemies are immune to the dazzle effect.

Spell.Name: Quell
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional Duration: 30 seconds School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No Quell disrupts the targets connection to all Divine Power. All Divine casters become powerless while under the effects of Quell. Powerful beings with a close personal connection to their deities may not be Quelled.

Spell.Name: Quiet Like a Ninja
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: Permanent School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Activating the power of this item will make you quiet as a ninja, granting a +5 Competence bonus to the Move Silently skill. This lasts until you activate the special power of another cosmetic item, or log out.

Spell.Name: Rage
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self Duration: 1 minute 30 seconds School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: No Causes the target and all nearby allies to fly into a screaming blood frenzy, gaining phenomenal strength and durability but becoming reckless. Grants a +2 Morale bonus to Strength, Constitution, and a +1 Morale bonus to Will saves, but also causes a -2 penalty to armor.

Spell.Name: Raise Dead
Spell.Description: Target: Friend School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Resurrects the target, restores 10% of the target's hit points, and preserves current spell points.

Spell.Name: Reconstruct
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self Duration: 30 seconds School: Transmutation Spell Resistance: No Greatly repairs an ally construct, restoring 10 hit points per caster level (max 150hp), while simultaneously granting an increase in attack speed for a short time.

Spell.Name: Regrowth
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 2 minutes 6 seconds School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Your wounds slowly close over time healing 100 hit points over 2 minutes.

Spell.Name: Remove Exhaustion
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self Spell Resistance: No Removes any Exhaustion and Fatigue effects.

Spell.Name: Repair Light Damage
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self School: Transmutation Spell Resistance: No Transmutes the structure of a living construct ally to repair 3 to 8 damage plus an additional 1 for every caster level up to caster level 5.

Spell.Name: Repair Moderate Damage
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self School: Transmutation Spell Resistance: No Transmutes the structure of a living construct ally to repair 6 to 16 damage plus an additional 1 for every caster level up to caster level 10.

Spell.Name: Resist Energy: Fire
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 3 minutes School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No Gives an ally limited protection from fire damage, reducing fire damage taken by 10. The damage reduction increases to 20 at caster level 7 and 30 at caster level 11.

Spell.Name: Restoration
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Cures all temporary ability damage, restores a single negative level suffered from energy drain, and eliminates fatigue or exhaustion suffered by the ally.

Spell.Name: Roc's Strength
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 30 seconds School: Transmutation Spell Resistance: No You temporarily gain strength and power, giving a +6 Quality bonus to strength.

Spell.Name: Salt Shot
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Fires a lance of Salt at enemies. At higher charge levels multiple knives are rapidly fired. Opponents struck by the knives receive a Reflex save for half damage.
Charge Tier 1: 4 to 14 + 1 to 2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 5 to 19 + 1 to 4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 6 to 24 + 1 to 6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 7 to 29 + 1 to 8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 8 to 34 + 1 to 10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Scarab of Protection Ward
Spell.Description: This effect absorbs negative energy, death and energy drain effects!

Spell.Name: Scare
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Positional Duration: 8 to 24 seconds School: Necromancy Spell Resistance: Yes Casts Cause Fear on multiple targets. Affected enemies become frightened. A successful Will save causes the target to become shaken instead. Targets subject to the fear effect will be slowed slightly by necrotic energy.

Spell.Name: Scorching Ray
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Blasts a target with fiery rays, each doing 4d3+12 Fire damage on impact. The number of rays increases by 1 ray for every four levels beyond 3rd, to a maximum of three rays at 11th level. Ray spells have double range.

Spell.Name: Searing Light
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Duration: 30 seconds School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Focuses divine power like a ray of the sun, causing a blast of light to deal 1d6+6 Light damage per caster level. (Maximum caster level 10). Undead creatures take 2d6+12 damage per caster level. Ray spells have double range.

Spell.Name: Selection of Enchanted Chocolates
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 10 minutes School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No This small decorative box contains four types of delicious chocolate candies. Each type not only has its own unique flavor but also conveys a helpful enchantment. The flavors are as follows: Dark Chocolate 'Magma' Truffle (Haste) Nut-hull Toffee Surprise (Stoneskin) Choco-Bacon-Berry Dream Bar (Bear's Endurance) Glacial Mint Bon Bon (Cone of Cold)

Spell.Name: Shadow Walk
Spell.Description: Target: Self School: Illusion Spell Resistance: No Transports you to the edge of the Material Plane where it borders the Plane of Shadow. While this spell is active, you receive a 50% Enhancement bonus to Run speed, and your outline appears faint and you are harder to hit (50% Concealment). Attacking another creature, or otherwise interacting with objects shunts you back to the Material Plane.

Spell.Name: Shadow Phase
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 20 seconds School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No You become invisible and are able to move through monsters as if you were ethereal for twenty seconds.

Spell.Name: Shadow Weapons
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 5 minutes School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Your target's currently equipped weapons gain Hit Effect: 1 to 6 negative damage. An item can have only one temporary item enchantment at a time.

Spell.Name: Shield
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 1 minute per caster level School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No Grants a +4 Shield bonus to Armor Class and protection from magic missiles.

Spell.Name: Shield of Faith
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self Duration: 1 minute School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No Creates a shimmering, magical field around an ally that averts attacks, giving a +2 Deflection bonus to AC. This bonus is increased by 1 for every 6 caster levels.

Spell.Name: Shout
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Emits an ear-splitting yell that does 4 to 8 Sonic damage per caster level to all targets in its path. A successful Fortitude save halves the damage.

Spell.Name: Sight of Vol
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self, Positional Duration: 2 minutes School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No This spell grants all characters in the area of effect True Sight and allows all to negate the miss chance for Incorporeal creatures. This cannot be dispelled.

Spell.Name: Slay Living
Spell.Description: A glass filled with a dark gas. When it breaks on impact, nearby enemies are subjected to a Slay Living effect. (Slays any living enemy or deals 12 to 18 damage on a successful Fortitude save).

Spell.Name: Sleep
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Positional Duration: 22 seconds School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: Yes Induces a magical slumber, rendering them helpless until attacked. Ineffective on undead or constructs. Lasts 20 seconds plus 2 seconds per caster level. A successful Will save negates this effect.

Spell.Name: Slow
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Positional Duration: 30 seconds School: Transmutation Spell Resistance: Yes Causes an enemy to move at 50% speed, attack at a 30% slowed rate, and have a -1 penalty on attack rolls, AC, and Reflex saves. A successful Will save negates this effect.

Spell.Name: Snap Trap
Spell.Description: Toss a snapping trap at the targeted enemy. If they don't make a Fortitude Save (DC20 + Dex/Int/Wis Mod + Assassinate DCs + Bonus Trap DCs) they are rooted in place by the trap's jaws for 12 seconds. Cooldown: 12 seconds.

Spell.Name: Solid Fog
Spell.Description: A glass vial filled with water and a thick mist. When it breaks on impact, a bank of Solid Fog is created on the enemy it struck.

Spell.Name: Sonic Blast
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Deals sonic damage to targets with a burst of sound. At higher charge tiers the blast is larger. Opponents within the blast receive a Will save for half damage.
Charge Tier 1: 1d6+1, plus 1 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 2d8+3, plus 1d2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 3d10+6, plus 1d10 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 4d12+10, plus 2d8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 5d14+15, plus 2d10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: Spell Absorption
Spell.Description: Spell Absorption: This effect absorbs harmful spells targeted at the wearer.

Spell.Name: Spell Store
Spell.Description: Target: Self School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No restores 5sp +5sp per caster level of item.

Spell.Name: Spider Cult Mask
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: Permanent School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Activating the power of this item will fill you with unholy power, granting a +1 Profane bonus to Charisma based skills and a +2 Profane bonus to saves against poisons. This lasts until you activate the special power of another cosmetic item, or log out.

Spell.Name: Staff of Arcane Power: Spell Selection
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 1 minute 36 seconds School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: Yes The staff may cast Magic Missile, Ray of Enfeeblement, Lightning Bolt, Fireball, Cone of Cold, Hold Monster or Globe of Invulnerability

Spell.Name: Stone to Flesh
Spell.Description: Target: Friend School: Transmutation Spell Resistance: No Restores a petrified creature, such as one affected by the Flesh to Stone spell, to its normal state.

Spell.Name: Stoneskin
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 1 minute per caster level School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No Wards an ally with damage reduction 10/adamantine. Once the spell has prevented a total of 10 points per caster level it is discharged. Otherwise it lasts 1 minute per caster level.

Spell.Name: Stormrage
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 18 seconds School: Transmutation Spell Resistance: No You gain featherfall and gain the Deflect Arrows feat. When you damage an enemy with attacks or spells, they are also struck by lightning. For each enemy, lightning strikes only once.

Spell.Name: Suggestion
Spell.Description: Target: Foe Duration: 40 seconds School: Enchantment Spell Resistance: Yes Influences the actions of an enemy, allowing you to suggest it to fight as your ally for 30 + 2 seconds per caster level. A successful Will save negates the effect.

Spell.Name: Summon Epic Thaarak Hound
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self, positional Duration: 5 minutes School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No This spell summons a tremendously powerful Thaarak hound to fight for you for a brief time.

Spell.Name: Summon Legendary Dinosaur
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self, positional Duration: 3 minutes School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No This spell summons a tremendously powerful Dinosaur to fight for you for a brief time.

Spell.Name: Summon Legendary Werewolf
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self, positional Duration: 5 minutes School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No This spell summons a tremendously powerful Werewolf to fight for you for a brief time.

Spell.Name: Summon Monster II
Spell.Description: Target: Self, Positional Duration: 10 minutes School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No This spell allows you to summon one of three different creatures: a fiendish monstrous scorpion, a fiendish bat, or a black widow. It will fight for you for a brief time, but you can only have one summoned creature serving you at a time. Summoning another creature will return this one to its home plane.

Spell.Name: Summon Monster III
Spell.Description: Target: Self, Positional Duration: 10 minutes School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No This spell allows you to summon one of three different creatures: a hellhound, a winter wolf, or an air mephit. It will fight for you for a brief time, but you can only have one summoned creature serving you at a time. Summoning another creature will return this one to its home plane.

Spell.Name: Summon Monster IV
Spell.Description: Target: Self, Positional Duration: 10 minutes School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No This spell allows you to summon one of three different creatures: a fiendish monstrous spider, a greater ice mephit, or a lantern archon. It will fight for you for a brief time, but you can only have one summoned creature serving you at a time. Summoning another creature will return this one to its home plane.

Spell.Name: Summon Monster VII
Spell.Description: Target: Self, Positional Duration: 10 minutes School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No This spell allows you to summon one of three different creatures: an efreeti, a djinn, or a huge earth elemental. It will fight for you for a brief time, but you can only have one summoned creature serving you at a time. Summoning another creature will return this one to its home plane.

Spell.Name: Summon Monster IX
Spell.Description: Target: Self, Positional Duration: 10 minutes School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No This spell allows you to summon one of three different creatures: a hezrou, an elder fire elemental, or an eladrin ghaele. It will fight for you for a brief time, but you can only have one summoned creature serving you at a time. Summoning another creature will return this one to its home plane.

Spell.Name: Summon Xoriat Horror
Spell.Description: Target: Self, Positional Duration: 5 minutes School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Creates a rift to the plane of Xoriat, summoning a randomly chosen monster to fight for you for a brief time.

Spell.Name: Summon Adventuring Party
Spell.Description:
Target: Self Duration: 1 minute School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Summons you entire adventuring group to your location. Summoned party members may decline.
Can only be used in public areas. Cannot bring anyone to locations that they do not already have access to and cannot enable anyone to travel between realms (from Eberron to the Forgotten Realms or vice versa.

Spell.Name: Summon Party Member
Spell.Description:
Target: Self School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Summons a member of your adventuring group to your location. You choose which member. Summoned party members may decline.
Can not bring anyone to locations that they do not already have access to and cannot enable anyone to travel between realms (from Eberron to the Forgotten Realms or vice versa.

Spell.Name: Sunburst
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Direction, Breakable Duration: 1 minute 5 seconds School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No A globe of searing radiance to explodes to blast targets for 5 to 10 of Light damage per caster level. Oozes and Undead take an additional 5 to 10 per caster level damage. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half and negates the blindness. Light fearing Undead may be instantly destroyed by this spell.

Spell.Name: Superior Efficacy
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 3 minutes School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No When activated, this effect provides a +15 Alchemical bonus to your Universal Spell Power for one minute.

Spell.Name: Swirling Icy Shield
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 1 minute School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No You are surrounded in a sphere of icy wind that reduces all damage (Except for Untyped damage) you take by 25% for one minute.

Spell.Name: Symbol of Fear
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Positional Duration: 1 minute 6 seconds School: Necromancy Spell Resistance: Yes You scribe a potent rune of power in the air. When the symbol is activated by a target approaching, all nearby targets are panicked for 6 seconds per caster level or until the symbol expires. A successful Will save negates this effect. A symbol will persist for about 5 minutes until triggered. Once triggered, a symbol's power begins to wane. A symbol will dissipate 20 seconds after first being triggered. Symbols are volatile when placed together.

Spell.Name: Teleport
Spell.Description: Target: Self School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Teleports you to one of a variety of locations.

Spell.Name: Titan's Grip
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 1 minute School: Spell Like Ability Spell Resistance: No Makes you as strong as a Warforged Titan, granting a +6 Psionic bonus to Strength.

Spell.Name: Titan Shield
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 15 seconds School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No Creates a shield protecting the caster from most physical damage and some spells. The shield is incapable of deflecting energy so fire, lightning etc should be avoided. DR 30/- and SR 30 for 15 seconds.

Spell.Name: Trash Shot
Spell.Description:
Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Fires a slow moving pile of burning trash. Opponents in the blast radius take bludgeoning, fire, poison, and rust damage. Opponents struck by this receive a Fortitude save for half damage. When fully charges, this fires two projectiles that fly mush faster. Enemies hit take the following values in each damage type: receive a Fortitude save for half damage.
Charge Tier 1: 4 to 10 + 1 to 2 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 2: 5 to 15 + 1 to 4 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 3: 6 to 20 + 1 to 6 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 4: 7 to 25 + 1 to 8 per Artificer Level Charge Tier 5: 8 to 30 + 1 to 10 per Artificer Level

Spell.Name: True Seeing
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self Duration: 1 minute per caster level School: Divination Spell Resistance: No You confer on the ally the ability to see things as they actually are. This allows the target to notice secret doors hidden by magic, see the exact location of creatures hidden by Blur or Displacement effects, and see Invisible creatures or objects normally.

Spell.Name: Turn the Page
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 6 seconds School: Abjuration Spell Resistance: No Turning the page of the Litany of the Dead releases magical energy that a spell caster can harness to power their own spells. Spell point costs are reduced by 50% for the next 6 seconds.

Spell.Name: Unholy Blight
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Positional, Breakable Duration: 8 seconds to 24 seconds School: Evocation Spell Resistance: No Unholy power smites your targets. Only Good and Neutral (Not Evil) creatures are harmed by the spell. This spell deals 1d6+8 points of damage per caster level (Maximum damage 10d6+80.) to a Good creatures/Outsiders and causes it to be Sickened for 6d4 seconds. A successful Will save reduces damage by half and negates the Sickened condition. Neutral targets take half damage 1d2+2 points of damage per 2 caster levels (Maximum damage 5d2+10), and they are not Sickened. This spell can only be cast by Evil or Neutral casters as it has no effect when cast by a Good caster.

Spell.Name: Vigilant Like The Night
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: Permanent School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Activating the power of this item will grant you a +5 Competence bonus to your Spot and Search skills. This lasts until you activate the special power of another cosmetic item, or log out.

Spell.Name: Warp Time
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: permanent School: Transmutation Spell Resistance: No This spell is able to warp the effect of time on the user, effectively increasing run speed. This enchantment is delicate, however, and is only usable in non-hostile areas like city wards and other pacified public areas.

Spell.Name: Water Breathing
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 1 minute 30 seconds School: Transmutation Spell Resistance: No Grants the caster the ability to breathe water.

Spell.Name: Web
Spell.Description: Target: Foe, Positional, Breakable Duration: 30 seconds School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Creates a many-layered mass of strong, sticky strands that entangle targets within them. A successful Reflex save negates this effect. Entangled creatures may attempt to make a Strength check every 2 seconds to escape. Area of effect fire spells will destroy these webs and free any entangled creatures. Incorporeal creatures, oozes, and spiders are naturally immune. Fire elementals and other fire creatures are immune because they burn through the webs.

Spell.Name: Whirlwind Absorption
Spell.Description: This effect absorbs air elementals knockdown attack.

Spell.Name: Wild Mage Surge
Spell.Description: Target: Friend, Self Duration: 15 minutes School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No As wild magic surges, a random spell will be cast.

Spell.Name: Woohoo! Let's party!
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: Permanent School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Activate the power of this item to be amazing at parties, granting a +7 Competence bonus to the Haggle skill and a +5 Competence bonus to the Perform and Diplomacy skills. This lasts until you activate the special power of another cosmetic item, or log out.

Spell.Name: Xachosian Spell Frenzy
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: 1 minutes School: Spell Like Ability Spell Resistance: No Spurred into action, the Xachosian Eardweller increases its hosts spellcasting abilities. This grants a 100% bonus to spell damage and healing for 1 minute. This effect does not stack with other spell boosting item effects or potions and does not affect the spells you cast with wands and scrolls. When the effect ends, the host is exhausted.

Spell.Name: You Can't See Me
Spell.Description: Target: Self Duration: Permanent School: Conjuration Spell Resistance: No Activating the power of this item will grant you a +5 Competence bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills. This lasts until you activate the special power of another cosmetic item, or log out.
